name: php
description:
PHP is a popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially
suited to web development. Fast, flexible and pragmatic, PHP powers
everything from your blog to the most popular websites in the world.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

dependencies.name: re2c
dependencies.description: re2c: a free and open-source lexer generator for C and C++

dependencies.name: libxml2
dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependencies.name: sqlite
dependencies.description:
SQLite3 is an SQL database engine in a C library. Programs that link the
SQLite3 library can have SQL database access without running a separate
RDBMS process.

dependent_to.name: weechat
dependent_to.description:
WeeChat is a fast, light and extensible chat client, with a text-based
user interface.
